channel.title: Getting Angry
channel.description:
Idk if this is bad or what the hell this means but its pissing me off. I tried adding drops to a new boss and compiled with no errors but when I run the server this is in the cmd:
[code]java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 1317" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:50) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:76) Loaded clipmap in 62ms. [/code]
What do I do?

item.title: Getting Angry
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

Welcome. Glad to help.

Read full topic

@coryallen1 wrote:

Ahhh simple as that. Thanks man!

item.title: Getting Angry
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

Yeah just like undo all the shit you changed to the file so it works again and start over.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Angry
item.dc:creator: @coryallen1 coryallen1
item.description:
@coryallen1 wrote:

Yes, I’ve tried to just do tabs. Could it be possible I messed one up and it interfered with the others and ill have to redo them?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Angry
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

You gotta put tabs in if you’re adding a new boss, not spaces. It might help to copy and paste another NPC’s information and just replace its stats with the new ones.

Read full topic
